name: Chill n Place
description:
A game about sitting back and just placing a variety of objects freely in your room while listening to some chill music.

The game was made by:
LOKO-606 (mostly programming)
Buenismo (3D models)

Controls
Mouse -> looking around
WASD -> walking
Space -> jumping
Left click -> place / hold object
R -> rotate held object
Left and Right arrows -> change music

Premade Assets used: player movement script, and the musics.
